## TocDataAttributes interface

Data attributes to override `toc` behavior per matching element

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface TocDataAttributes 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  ["data-toc-id"?](./toc.tocdataattributes._data-toc-id_.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ the <code>id</code> to use for this element in <code>toc</code> context. If not provided, this will be the element <code>id</code>, or generated by <code>toc</code> if element does not have an <code>id</code> either. |
|  ["data-toc-ignore"?](./toc.tocdataattributes._data-toc-ignore_.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ whether to ignore this element when searching for matching elements |
|  ["data-toc-strategy"?](./toc.tocdataattributes._data-toc-strategy_.md) |  | [TocObserveParameters](./toc.tocobserveparameters.md)<!-- -->\['strategy'\] | _(Optional)_ override the <code>strategy</code> for this element to use in creating <code>IntersectionObserver</code> This only has effect if the <code>observe</code> option is enabled in [TocParameters](./toc.tocparameters.md) |
|  ["data-toc-threshold"?](./toc.tocdataattributes._data-toc-threshold_.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ override the <code>threshold</code> for this element to use in creating <code>IntersectionObserver</code> This only has effect if the <code>observe</code> option is enabled in [TocParameters](./toc.tocparameters.md) |
